q: Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. "No state needs to declare bankruptcy," Bill Lockyer said, The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't. Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments that lack the capacity to repay their debts.
